data.lyric:
[ti:Some Of It]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Desperate Man]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Some Of It - Eric Church
[00:09.40]Beer don't keep
[00:10.71]Love's not cheap
[00:11.93]And trucks don't wreck themselves
[00:15.26]Mama ain't a shrink
[00:16.72]Daddy ain't a bank
[00:17.99]And God ain't a wishin' well
[00:21.19]Money ain't rich
[00:22.67]Everybody sins
[00:24.00]And nobody wins in a fight
[00:27.08]And sometimes wrong is right
[00:33.24]Some of it you learn the hard way
[00:36.20]Some of it you read on a page
[00:39.18]Some of it comes from heartbreak
[00:42.29]Most of it comes with age
[00:44.89]And none of it ever comes easy
[00:48.18]A bunch of it you maybe can't use
[00:50.78]I know I don't probably know what I think I do
[00:54.63]But there's something to some of it
[01:09.27]Girls like to laugh
[01:10.67]Tears don't last
[01:11.93]And scared's what praying's for
[01:14.81]If it's close swing the bat
[01:16.35]Everybody's gotta past
[01:17.83]And love's worth living for
[01:20.77]When you dance hold her close
[01:22.19]'Til it breaks go for broke
[01:23.61]Be the first to reach for her hand
[01:26.76]No you don't get to do some things again
[01:33.27]Some of it you learn the hard way
[01:36.14]Some of it you read on a page
[01:39.16]Some of it comes from heartbreak
[01:42.25]Most of it comes with age
[01:44.85]And none of it ever comes easy
[01:48.04]A bunch of it you maybe can't use
[01:50.78]I know I don't probably know what I think I do
[01:54.54]But there's something to some of it
[02:17.60]When you can't take it slow
[02:19.22]'Cause time sure won't
[02:20.82]What really makes you a man
[02:23.90]Is being true to her 'til your glass runs out of sand
[02:30.20]Some of it you learn the hard way
[02:33.19]Some of it you read on a page
[02:36.18]Some of it comes from heartbreak
[02:39.19]Most of it comes with age
[02:41.84]And none of it ever comes easy
[02:45.10]A bunch of it you maybe can't use
[02:47.83]I know I don't probably know what I think I do
[02:51.73]But there's something to some of it
[02:59.41]Some of it
data.trans:
[ti:Some Of It]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Desperate Man]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.40]啤酒会挥发
[00:10.71]爱情不廉价
[00:11.93]卡车不会自己撞毁
[00:15.26]姑娘不是心理学家
[00:16.72]老爸不是取款机
[00:17.99]上帝不是许愿树
[00:21.19]金钱不代表富有
[00:22.67]每个人都犯过错
[00:24.00]战斗没有赢家
[00:27.08]有时 错也是对
[00:33.24]有些事你吃过亏之后才明白
[00:36.20]有些事你从书上就可以学到
[00:39.18]有些事心碎过后才会懂
[00:42.29]大部分事情长大之后就慢慢学会了
[00:44.89]但这一切都来之不易
[00:48.18]很多知识你可能用不上
[00:50.78]我可能不知道自己在想什么 做什么
[00:54.63]但这其中也暗含哲理
[01:09.27]女孩们喜欢笑
[01:10.67]眼泪说没就没
[01:11.93]因为恐惧 所以祈祷
[01:14.81]如果时机到了 就果断出击
[01:16.35]每个人都有一段过去
[01:17.83]爱情是生命的真谛
[01:20.77]当你跳舞时 把她抱紧
[01:22.19]直到事情彻底失控
[01:23.61]成为第一个牵起她的手的人
[01:26.76]不 你不需要再做什么
[01:33.27]有些事你吃过亏之后才明白
[01:36.14]有些事你从书上就可以学到
[01:39.16]有些事心碎过后才会懂
[01:42.25]大部分事情长大之后就慢慢学会了
[01:44.85]但这一切都来之不易
[01:48.04]很多知识你可能用不上
[01:50.78]我可能不知道自己在想什么 做什么
[01:54.54]但这其中也暗含哲理
[02:17.60]若是你无法放慢节奏
[02:19.22]因为时间不允许
[02:20.82]让你成长为男子汉的
[02:23.90]是对女孩的忠诚 直到杯子里的沙子全部流失
[02:30.20]有些事你吃过亏之后才明白
[02:33.19]有些事你从书上就可以学到
[02:36.18]有些事心碎过后才会懂
[02:39.19]大部分事情长大之后就慢慢学会了
[02:41.84]但这一切都来之不易
[02:45.10]很多知识你可能用不上
[02:47.83]我可能不知道自己在想什么 做什么
[02:51.73]但这其中也暗含哲理
[02:59.41]暗含哲理
